TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpHandler

summary.span: 定義 ASP.NET 使用自訂 HTTP 處理常式所實作的合約，以同步處理 HTTP Web 要求。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to synchronously process HTTP Web requests using custom HTTP handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以撰寫自訂 HTTP 處理常式來處理特定、 預先定義的任何 Common Language Specification (CLS) 標準的語言中的 HTTP 要求的型別。You can write custom HTTP handlers to process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests in any Common Language Specification (CLS) compliant language. 可執行程式碼中定義`HttpHandler`類別，而不是傳統的 ASP 或 ASP.NET Web 網頁，這些特定要求的回應。Executable code defined in the `HttpHandler` classes, rather than conventional ASP or ASP.NET Web pages, responds to these specific requests. HTTP 處理常式提供一種互動的低層級的要求和回應服務的 IIS 網頁伺服器，並且大部分的 ISAPI 擴充功能類似，但與簡單的程式設計模型提供的功能。HTTP handlers give you a means of interacting with the low-level request and response services of the IIS Web server and provide functionality much like ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model. 如果您的處理常式會存取工作階段狀態的值，就必須實作介面 （沒有方法是標記介面）。If your handler will access session state values, it must implement the interface (a marker interface with no methods).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReusable As Boolean
public: property bool IsReusable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出另一個要求是否可以使用 執行個體。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the instance.

value.span: 如果 執行個體可重複使用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the instance is reusable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 明確地設定屬性`true`或`false`由您提供程式碼會覆寫屬性存取子 (getter)。You explicitly set the property to `true` or `false` by code you provide that overrides the property accessor (getter). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將四行的文字寫入 HTTP 輸出資料流，以名為 handler.aspx 的頁面的用戶端要求的回應。The following code example writes four lines of text to the HTTP output stream in response to a client request for a page named handler.aspx. 所有要求的 handler.aspx 會由都服務`MyHttpHandler`命名空間中的類別`HandlerExample`包含在組件 HandlerTest.dll。All requests for handler.aspx are serviced by the `MyHttpHandler` class in the namespace `HandlerExample` contained in the assembly HandlerTest.dll. [!code-csharp[Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，提供對內建伺服器物件 (例如 、、 和 ) 的參考，用來服務 HTTP 要求。

span.span: An object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, , , , and ) used to service HTTP requests.

summary.span: 以實作 介面的自訂 來啟用 HTTP Web 要求的處理。

span.span: Enables processing of HTTP Web requests by a custom that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將您的自訂`HttpHandler`中的程式碼虛擬方法，如下列範例所示。Place your custom `HttpHandler` code in the virtual method, as shown in the following example. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將四行的文字寫入 HTTP 輸出資料流，以名為 handler.aspx 的頁面的用戶端要求的回應。The following code example writes four lines of text to the HTTP output stream in response to a client request for a page named handler.aspx. 所有要求的 handler.aspx 會由都服務`MyHttpHandler`命名空間中的類別`HandlerExample`包含在組件 HandlerTest.dll。All requests for handler.aspx are serviced by the `MyHttpHandler` class in the namespace `HandlerExample` contained in the assembly HandlerTest.dll.
